chinese: 小明有一部新的智能手机。
pinyin: Xiǎo Míng yǒu yī bù xīn de zhìnéng shǒujī.
translation: Xiao Ming has a new smartphone.

breakdown.meaning: Xiao Ming (name) (小 = small, 明 = bright)
one unit (measure word for devices) (一 = one, 部 = part/unit)
smartphone (智能 = smart/intelligent, 手机 = mobile phone)

chinese: 每天早上，他用手机看新闻，也用手机学习中文。
pinyin: Měitiān zǎoshang, tā yòng shǒujī kàn xīnwén, yě yòng shǒujī xuéxí Zhōngwén.
translation: Every morning, he uses his phone to read the news and learn Chinese.

breakdown.meaning: every day (每 = every, 天 = day)
mobile phone (手 = hand, 机 = machine)
mobile phone (手 = hand, 机 = machine)
to learn (学 = study, 习 = practice)
Chinese language (中 = middle/China, 文 = language/writing)

chinese: 一天，小明的手机没电了，他找不到充电器。
pinyin: Yī tiān, Xiǎo Míng de shǒujī méi diàn le, tā zhǎo bù dào chōngdiànqì.
translation: One day, Xiao Ming's phone ran out of battery, and he couldn't find the charger.

breakdown.meaning: one day (一 = one, 天 = day)
Xiao Ming (name) (小 = small, 明 = bright)
mobile phone (手 = hand, 机 = machine)
no battery (没 = no/not, 电 = electricity)
can't find (找 = to find, 不 = not, 到 = to reach)
charger (充电 = to charge, 器 = device)

chinese: 他觉得很不方便，因为他不能查天气，也不能听音乐。
pinyin: Tā juéde hěn bù fāngbiàn, yīnwèi tā bù néng chá tiānqì, yě bù néng tīng yīnyuè.
translation: He felt very inconvenienced because he couldn't check the weather or listen to music.

breakdown.meaning: to feel/think (觉 = to feel, 得 = particle indicating possibility)

chinese: 后来，小明想了一个办法。
pinyin: Hòulái, Xiǎo Míng xiǎng le yī gè bànfǎ.
translation: Later, Xiao Ming thought of a solution.

breakdown.meaning: Xiao Ming (小 = little, 明 = bright)
thought (想 = think, 了 = completed action marker)
one (一 = one, 个 = measure word)

chinese: 他去书店买了一本书，开始用书学习。
pinyin: Tā qù shūdiàn mǎi le yī běn shū, kāishǐ yòng shū xuéxí.
translation: He went to the bookstore, bought a book, and started learning with it.

breakdown.meaning: bought (买 = to buy, 了 = particle indicating completed action)
one (measure word for books) (一 = one, 本 = measure word for books)
to start (开 = to open, 始 = to begin)
to study (学 = to learn, 习 = to practice)

chinese: 他发现，不用手机也可以学到很多东西。
pinyin: Tā fāxiàn, bù yòng shǒujī yě kěyǐ xué dào hěn duō dōngxi.
translation: He realized that he could still learn a lot without using his phone.

breakdown.meaning: discovered/realized (发 = to send, 现 = to appear)
without using (不 = not, 用 = to use)
mobile phone (手 = hand, 机 = machine)
can (可 = can, 以 = to use)
learn (学 = to learn, 到 = to reach)
a lot (很 = very, 多 = many)

chinese: 晚上，手机充满电了，小明又可以用手机了。
pinyin: Wǎnshàng, shǒujī chōngmǎn diàn le, Xiǎo Míng yòu kěyǐ yòng shǒujī le.
translation: At night, the phone was fully charged, and Xiao Ming could use it again.

breakdown.meaning: mobile phone (手 = hand, 机 = machine)
fully charged (充 = to fill, 满 = full)
can (可 = can, 以 = to use)
mobile phone (手 = hand, 机 = machine)

chinese: 但是，他决定以后每天少用一点手机。
pinyin: Dànshì, tā juédìng yǐhòu měitiān shǎo yòng yīdiǎn shǒujī.
translation: However, he decided to use his phone a little less every day in the future.

breakdown.meaning: but/however (但 = but, 是 = to be)
decided (决 = to decide, 定 = to set)
in the future (以 = to use, 后 = after)
every day (每 = every, 天 = day)
use less (少 = few, 用 = to use)
a little (一 = one, 点 = dot/little)
mobile phone (手 = hand, 机 = machine)

chinese: 多看看书，多和家人聊天。
pinyin: Duō kàn kàn shū, duō hé jiārén liáotiān.
translation: Read more books and chat more with family.

breakdown.meaning: take a look (看 = to see, 看 = to see (repeated for emphasis))
chat (聊 = to chat, 天 = sky/space (used as a metaphor for casual talking))

chinese: 有时候，他和朋友在网上聊天，一起玩游戏。
pinyin: Yǒu shíhòu, tā hé péngyǒu zài wǎngshàng liáotiān, yīqǐ wán yóuxì.
translation: Sometimes, he chats with friends online and plays games together.

breakdown.meaning: sometimes (有 = to have, 时候 = time/moment)
chat (聊 = to chat, 天 = sky/space (used as a metaphor for casual talking))
games (游 = to swim, 戏 = play)
